name: YmsCoreBluetooth
summary: ObjectiveC Block-based API for Bluetooth LE communication.
description: A block-based framework for building Bluetooth 4.0 Low Energy (aka Smart or LE) iOS 7 or OS X 10.9 applications using the CoreBluetooth API. Includes *Deanna* and *DeannaMac*, applications to communicate with a [TI SensorTag](http://processors.wiki.ti.com/index.php/Bluetooth_SensorTag) for iOS and OS X respectively.
